data.title: city of Llano Grande in Texas Typical Weather By Month, Average Temperature and More
data.meta_description: Historical weather for the city of Llano Grande in Texas. View the typical weather in city of Llano Grande. Learn about the average high and low temps, windiest months and  rainiest months. Make sure your dressed for hot and humid days. Discover the typical snowfall by month
data.text:
Instead of using humidity directly we use dew point to measure what people commonly mean when saying it feels humid. Dew point is classified into 4 categories: Dry (under 25°F), Comfortable (25°F to 60°F), Muggy (60°F to 70°F) and Oppressive (70°F or greater). The table below shows the percentage of days with a dew point within a particular class.

JanFebMarAprMayJunDry2.32.30.00.00.00.6Comfortable77.959.944.323.58.63.9Muggy19.836.853.557.932.020.5Oppressive0.01.02.218.659.575.0

JulAugSepOctNovDecDry2.71.30.20.00.31.6Comfortable3.34.24.422.851.463.3Muggy10.417.421.645.341.532.6Oppressive83.777.273.832.06.92.5

The table below shows the distribution of average wind speeds in miles per hour for a given month or day. Wind speed may vary throughout a day and we show the average speed. Peak gusts or sustained maximum speeds may be significantly higher.
